name: websearch_web_search
description:
Search the web for information.
Use this tool when you need to search the web for information.
You can use this tool to search for news, blogs, or all types of information.
You can also use this tool to search for information about a specific company or product.
You can also use this tool to search for information about a specific person.
You can also use this tool to search for information about a specific product.
You can also use this tool to search for information about a specific company.
You can also use this tool to search for information about a specific event.
You can also use this tool to search for information about a specific location.
You can also use this tool to search for information about a specific thing.
If you request search with 1 result number and failed, retry with bigger results number.

query.description: The search query to look up

includeDomains.description: Only include these domains in results
